Class ChangeMaker

java.lang.Object
  ChangeMaker

public class ChangeMaker
extends java.lang.Object

ChangeMaker calculates the change the user is due in standard dollar format as well as in terms of coins. The program then prompts the user if they would like to make another transaction.

Version:
September 6, 2016
Author:
Alex Yu
